title: The Property at Cotswolds Water Park Is Better Than Anywhere Else (P Reeves)
text: By P Reeves Sep 24, 2015 It is an area of outstanding beauty which is filled with some amazing sights and places of wonderful tranquillity. London is only 65 miles away, yet you could be in a different world. There are large meadows full of trees and plants and stunning lakes that really add to the beauty of the place. As it is such a beautiful place, it is visited by many hundreds of people every year - which adds to the importance of the area. Therefore, anyone who invests in property here is likely to make a good return on their investment.One of the other great points of the Cotswold Water Park, is that although when you are there you will feel relaxed and cut off from the humdrum of daily life, it is actually really easy to get to as it is connected to most other places in the country. You can get a train here from London, Birmingham or Cardiff, and they stop at various stations in the area such as Bath, Cheltenham and Stroud. You can also travel to The Cotswolds by Bus with many buses running through the main towns in the area. The Cotswolds are also well placed for the motorway network, with the M4, M5 and M40 all providing easy access.There are many hotels available in The Cotswolds, but to really experience all the area has to offer, you should stay in one of the many waterside lodges available here. The luxury lodges available at Watermark Cotswolds offer a standard of living that is equal to that in a five-star hotel. Inside the Lodges, you will receive not only top class accommodation, but amazing entertainment facilities and the possibility of enjoying a BBQ on your deck with uninterrupted views across the deck.The properties available at Watermark provide the most incredible holiday experience you will ever find within the UK. They have a wide variety of properties available with different bedroom numbers to accommodate families of all sizes. Just an hour and a half drive from London is an area of outstanding beauty that will allow you to relax away from the humdrum of daily life. About the Author
